name: Full Ounce of Top Shelf Greenhouse Bud Select Strains
description:
A doap deal on an ounce of organic awesome pot in the Pleasant Hill and surrounding areas! Get a full ounce of select top shelf bud strains for only $150. That's 28 grams of top shelf flower. Tax and delivery are included. Delivery takes about an hour. Pay via cash, credit, or crypto at the time of delivery.  Call us at (925)891-7800 and we'll be happy to help you place an order over the phone.  Or order direct from the website.  There is no account creation required and the process allows you to remain anonymous except for a quick ID check at the time of delivery.

As a highly experienced budtender, I am excited to share with you the amazing deal we have at Pleasant Hill Doap  Our full ounce of selected top shelf bud strains are only $150, and that includes tax and delivery! That's 28 grams of the best flower you can find.

We understand that everyone has their preferred method of payment, which is why we offer flexible payment options including cash, credit, and even crypto. At the time of delivery, you can pay using your preferred method.

Our delivery service is the oldest and most trusted in the area, so you can count on us to provide you with the best cannabis products quickly and efficiently. As a top-rated budtender, I highly recommend this deal for anyone looking for top-quality flower at an affordable price.

Please note that upon delivery, our budtender will require you to show your ID. It's important to us that we comply with all laws and regulations regarding the sale and delivery of cannabis products.

Thank you for considering Pleasant Hill Doap for your cannabis needs. We look forward to serving you and providing you with the best possible experience.
short_description: Get a full ounce of select top shelf bud strains for only $150. That’s 28 grams of top shelf flower. Tax and delivery are included. Delivery takes about an hour. Pay via cash, credit, or crypto at the time of delivery. Call and speak with a budtender.
